{% raw_html "h_intro" value="Start Your Digital Transformation.", label="h_intro", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "p_intro" value="Are you growing frustrated with using Word, Excel, Powerpoint or homegrown systems to create and manage work instructions, SOPs and training documents? Tired of paper and inefficient processes? Job Element Monitor (JEM) is an easy-to-use, software solution to configure digital work instructions, enforce process control and error proof operations. Easily connect IoT devices while collecting 100% time studies, process data and images down to the task level for review and Andon reporting needs. Real-time visibility of operations and quality control at a whole new level!", label="p_intro", extra_classes="lead-md-md" %}

{% image "image_intro" label="image_intro", alt="", src="https://picsum.photos/400/200", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "h_wi" value="Smart Work Instructions.", label="h_wi", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "p1_wi" value="Build products right - every time!", label="p1_wi", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "p2_wi" value="Whether you are a model-based or component-based manufacturer with thousands of parts or product variations, eFlex has you covered. Link work instructions to Bill of Materials (BOMs), ensuring products are built correctly, every time, even when changes are made in process. Work instructions that are part of an advanced system will automatically react to your model and component variations, and only display the correct work instructions for what is currently being built in station.", label="p2_wi", extra_classes="lead-md" %}

{% image "image_wi" label="image_wi", alt="", src="https://f.hubspotusercontent00.net/hubfs/8439350/Images/infographic_BomModel.png", extra_classes="" %}

BOM or Model

Easily connect to upper level systems (ERP).

Work Instructions & Device Control Variables

Automatically display the correct build option, associated work instruction, and device control based on BOM or Model at the station level.

Collected Data

Collect and analyze unlimited process data for continuous improvement.

  • Torque & Angle
  • Pass & Fail
  • Cycle Time
  • Digital Birth Certificate
  • and more...

{% raw_html "title_card2" value="Completely connected with integrated tooling", label="title_card2", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "title_card4" value="Advanced BI Reporting, Dashboards, & Alerts", label="title_card4", extra_classes="" %}

Get alerts via email and texts.", label="textOverlay_card4", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "title_card5" value="Web-Based", label="title_card5", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "textOverlay_card5" value="JEM is a web-based software application. Create work instructions or view reports anywhere, anytime via browser on any web-capable device - Surface Tablet, Chromebook, iPad, etc. No client side software load required. Monitor real-time production as needed.", label="textOverlay_card5", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "title_card6" value="Document Library & Version Control", label="title_card6", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "textOverlay_card6" value="JEM has a built-in library within its editor tool to store and access work instructions. Only team members allowed to edit work instructions will have access to the library and work instruction approval process. Built-in version control captures when work instruction are updated and approved.", label="textOverlay_card6", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "title_card7" value="Real-Time Interactions & Cycle Times", label="title_card7", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "textOverlay_card7" value="Work instructions and tasks are displayed in real-time. Get 100% time capture for each process task start & stop. Cycle time indicator shows targeted time for each station as well as actual time per station. Station data gives management the tools they need to make data-driven operational decisions.", label="textOverlay_card7", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "title_card8" value="Accelerated Training", label="title_card8", extra_classes="" %}
{% raw_html "textOverlay_card8" value="Off-line mode for separate training and production statuses. When new staff is able to walk through each production task step-by-step with written instructions and/or visuals, training is accelerated. {% raw_html "title_card9" value="Data Collection For Entire Process - End to End", label="title_card9", extra_classes="" %}

No limits on what you can collect and view.", label="textOverlay_card9", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "h1_advCapabilities" value="JEM's Advanced Capabilities", label="h1_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "p1_advCapabilities" value="Guide operators and error proof at a whole new level with these advanced capabilities!", label="p1_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}

{% image "image_uiDevice1_advCapabiltiies" label="image_uiDevice1_advCapabiltiies", alt="eFlex Systems Interface Example.", src="https://picsum.photos/400/300", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "h1_advCapabilities" value="Event-based work instructions.", label="h1_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "p1_advCapabilities" value="Provide automatic feedback loops to operators and never leave them guessing what to do next. For example, if a part is rejected at the station, a work instruction would automatically display to the operator what to do based on the rejected event. When work instructions are formatted to show operators exactly what to do given possible events, delays and errors are virtually eliminated.", label="p1_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "h2_advCapabilities" value="Animated Guidance", label="h2_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "p2_advCapabilities" value="Animated guidance provides faster learning potential and visually guides operators through work instructions. For example, if an operator has five bolts to fasten, the work instructions would highlight the bolt to be fastened first, then, when that is completed, would highlight each subsequent bolt in order until the series is completed. This provides more specific visual guidance and ordering with less room for error and misunderstanding.", label="p2_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}

{% image "image_uiDevice2_advCapabiltiies" label="image_uiDevice2_advCapabiltiies", alt="eFlex Systems Interface Example.", src="https://picsum.photos/400/300", extra_classes="" %}
{% image "image_uiDevice3_advCapabiltiies" label="image_uiDevice3_advCapabiltiies", alt="eFlex Systems Interface Example.", src="https://picsum.photos/400/300", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "h3_advCapabilities" value="Process data capture.", label="h3_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}

{% raw_html "p3_advCapabilities" value="Collect unlimited amounts of process data with built-in and customizable data collection fields. Track items such as – cycle times, quality checklists, inspections/verifications, who completed them, tooling measurements, camera images, user specific notes, and much more. This will further eliminate paper at the station level and reduce manual data entry errors or missed entries.", label="p3_advCapabilities", extra_classes="" %}
